data.description: About Koddi We are a global technology company with software and services that help top digital marketplaces effectively monetize their first-party audiences through industry-leading commerce media technology and strategy. Our enterprise platforms leverage first-party data to drive marketplace revenue and profit by improving user experience and target shoppers throughout the purchase path. Koddi’s platforms enable any advertiser, any marketplace, in any industry to increase awareness, generate demand, and drive revenue. We are committed to driving innovation and growth in the commerce media space. As part of that commitment, we’ve launched Koddi Academy, a learning platform designed to provide expert knowledge, competitive insights, and practical strategies for thriving in this fast-growing industry. Explore our latest certification course, to deepen your expertise and stay ahead in the evolving world of commerce media. You can also sign up for our waiting list to be notified when new courses are released. Get started today at Koddi Academy. Associate Analyst Cohort Koddi is excited to announce two Analyst Cohort programs - one launching on February 16, 2026, and a second beginning on June 8, 2026. These intensive 8-week training programs are designed for recent graduates with Marketing, Business, or Analytics degrees, as well as those who have completed Data Analytics bootcamps. Participants will gain hands-on experience in all aspects of Data Analysis at Koddi, along with instructor-led and self-paced leadership development opportunities throughout the program and beyond. Program Highlights: Beginning February 16th and June 8th , 2026, both running 8 weeks long Work with industry-leading experts to gain hands-on knowledge and experience Gain a comprehensive understanding of the Koddi business Have the opportunity to share and present ideas with team members Participate in leadership workshops and soft skill development Receive executive mentorship and peer-to-peer support throughout the program What you'll do Analyzing both quantitative and qualitative data to generate actionable insights Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to deliver client requirements Communicate with clients regularly to deliver insights on trends and strategic recommendations for growth Solve complex business and technical problems by collecting, aggregating, and analyzing data from multiple sources, diagnosing issues, and driving solutions that support larger business objectives Work with a team of client strategy, data, and technology professionals to drive cross-functional projects, ensuring scalable and repeatable outcomes for client success What you'll bring Analyzing both quantitative and qualitative data to generate actionable insights Graduating with a Bachelors or Masters degree in Digital Marketing, Advertising, Data Science or Analytics or successful completion of relevant bootcamp coursework Graduation/Bootcamp completion date no later than May 2026 Strong analytical mindset with proficiency in data analytics tools, like Excel, for evaluating, modeling, and interpreting complex data. Detail-oriented, organized, and capable of handling multiple projects and meeting deadlines in both independent and team environments. Ability to clearly explain complex information and trends to clients and stakeholders. Skilled in data visualization to present actionable insights that drive strategic decisions for clients. Excellent communication skills and eagerness to learn Enjoys working in a fast paced environment with high collaboration Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment Availability to be onsite for the duration of the program Monday-Friday in our Fort Worth office Availability to work Full Time after the cohort program
requirements: Work with industry-leading experts to gain hands-on knowledge and experience
Graduating with a Bachelors or Masters degree in Digital Marketing, Advertising, Data Science or Analytics or successful completion of relevant bootcamp coursework
